statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT customer_id, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY installation_date DESC, customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, installation_date FROM customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE installation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY installation_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL ORDER BY customer_name ASC, address DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, installation_date FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY installation_date DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM customer_billing ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, billing_address FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE billing_address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY billing_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount FROM customer_billing WHERE billing_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, billing_amount, installation_date FROM customer_billing INNER JOIN solar_invoicing ON customer_billing.customer_id = solar_invoicing.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_amount, status FROM customer_billing INNER JOIN solar_invoicing ON customer_billing.customer_id = solar_invoicing.customer_id WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM invoices ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, installation_date FROM installations WHERE solar_panels_count > 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM invoices GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM invoices WHERE customer_id = 2 AND amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, installation_date FROM installations WHERE solar_panels_count >= 10 ORDER BY installation_date ASC;
SELECT invoice_id, amount, due_date FROM invoices WHERE amount < 500 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM installations WHERE system_capacity > 5.0 ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, invoice_amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id WHERE invoices.invoice_amount > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, payment_amount FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id JOIN payments ON invoices.invoice_id = payments.invoice_id WHERE payments.payment_amount < invoices.invoice_amount;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(invoice_amount) AS max_amount FROM invoices;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payments > 1000;

SELECT customer_name, invoice_date, payment_date FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id JOIN payments ON invoices.invoice_id = payments.invoice_id ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT installation_date, solar_panel_type, solar_panel_quantity FROM installations WHERE solar_panel_quantity > 5;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM installations WHERE solar_panel_quantity > 10 AND solar_panel_type = 'Monocrystalline';
SELECT customers.customer_name, invoices.invoice_date, invoices.amount_due FROM customers JOIN invoices ON customers.customer_id = invoices.customer_id;
SELECT panel_brand, panel_capacity, panel_warranty_years FROM solar_panels WHERE panel_capacity >= 4.5 ORDER BY panel_capacity DESC;
